word: So, in the cultivation of character, you must cooperate with God. His word directs you "to work out your own salvation with fear and trembling. For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of His good pleasure." You have a part to act, and as you act this part, God will surely cooperate with you.--Letter 130, 1903. (To "My Dear Granddaughter" Ella White, July 5, 1903.)
